page.title: 01A GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: There is a remarkable contrast in what is known of the past of the two villages within our block.{Aston {Ingham}has a documented history since it's inclusion in the original {Domesday Book}although it existed centuries before this. On the other hand there appears to be no reference to the history of{Cliffords Mesne}at all and all that we have found out has been by talking to residents of long- standing. Both parishes were of a very scattered nature until recent years when a small amount of new housing has been permitted in both Aston Ingham and Cliffords Mesne and which now forms a small centre to each village.
